messages.subject: The Other Nanjing Massacre.
messages.msgSnippet: I wrote an article for Yahoo that has to do with Japanese and Chinese history. It focuses on Chinese films and propaganda. The moral of the article is I
messages.messageBody:
I wrote an article for Yahoo that has to do with Japanese and Chinese history. It focuses on Chinese films and propaganda. The moral of the article is I suppose, that it's time to give the Japanese a break concerning what happened in 1937 in Nanjing. No nation has a perfect history.
I hope you don't find it too opinionated.
http://voices.yahoo.com/the-other-nanjing-massacre-11620268.html
